abstract: Walt Disney Company announces merger of Disney Consumer Products and Disney Interactive, sign of increasing overlap between divisions that handled digital and traditional forms of entertainment.
lead_paragraph: The restructuring that joins Disney Consumer Products and Disney Interactive reflects growing overlap between the two businesses.

headline.main: Disney Merges Consumer Product and Interactive Units
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Disney Will Merge Divisions Dealing With Digital Products

snippet: The restructuring that joins Disney Consumer Products and Disney Interactive reflects growing overlap between the two businesses.
